Tweaks.name: Tweaked Gravel
Tweaks.description: Changes the Gravel texture to make it grainier.

Tweaks.name: Classic Gravel
Tweaks.description: Changes the Gravel texture to the classic one.

Tweaks.name: Brown Podzol
Tweaks.description: Changes the Podzol texture to remove the greenish specs in it.

Tweaks.name: Faceless Pumpkins
Tweaks.description: Exchanges the Pumpkin's face texture with its side texture to rid the standard Pumpkins of their faces.

Tweaks.name: Consistent Horse Armor
Tweaks.description: Changes the Iron and Diamond Horse Armor to be consistent with their item versions. Iron Horse Armor will get a black saddle and Diamond Horse Armor will get a blue saddle.

Tweaks.name: Blinking Ender Eye
Tweaks.description: Gives the Ender Eye an animation that has it blinking from time to time.

Tweaks.name: Mixed Hurt Sounds
Tweaks.description:
Mixes the Hurting sounds for the player with the old Beta sound so that they play at the same time when a player gets hurt. This also applies to the new specific Hurting sounds that play when the player is hurt by Sweet Berry Bushes, Drowning or Fire.

requiresefr

⚠️ Careful: Some mods assign the standard player Hurting sound to mobs. Using this Addon will give them the classic Hurting sound aswell, so keep that in mind.

Tweaks.name: Consistent Wheat
Tweaks.description: Makes the Wheat texture consistent with the color palette of Hay Bales.

Tweaks.name: Useful Chainmail
Tweaks.description:
Changes the texture of all Chainmail pieces so that they look a little more tangible.

requiresefr

attscript

Tweaks.name: Consistent Helmets
Tweaks.description:
Provides a noseguard in the item textures of Iron Helmets, Gold Helmets and Diamond Helmets.

inspirationvt

Tweaks.name: Blinking Observers
Tweaks.description:
Gives the Observer face an animation that has it blinking and shifting eyes from time to time.

requiresefr

Tweaks.name: Blooming Cactus
Tweaks.description:
Adds blooming blossoms to the side and top of the Cactus texture.

incompat{Cactus Complete Pack}

Tweaks.name: Beta Cow Sounds
Tweaks.description:
Changes all sounds Cows make into those of Minecraft Beta.

⚠️ Careful: Should a mod add another type of cow that utilizes vanilla cows as a basis, they will also emit the sounds from this Addon.

Tweaks.name: Consistent Iron Nugget
Tweaks.description:
Changes the texture of the Iron Nugget, to fit the lineart of the Gold Nugget and the color palette of the Iron Ingot.

requiresefr

Tweaks.name: Black Granite
Tweaks.description:
Changes the Granite texture to turn it into deep black with white specs.

requiresefr

inspiration{[Redrooey](https://www.planetminecraft.com/texture-pack/black-granite/)}

Tweaks.name: Pebble-free Dirt
Tweaks.description:
Changes the textures of all dirt variations so that they have no pebbles in them.

requiresefr

inspirationvt

Tweaks.name: Illager Witch
Tweaks.description: Changes the color scheme of the Witch to be more in line with how the Illagers from the Village & Pillage Update look.

Tweaks.name: Consistent Leather
Tweaks.description:
Changes the textures of Leather, Saddles, Item Frames (both in item and entity/block form) and Books to have the color palette of Leather Armor.

inspirationvt

Tweaks.name: Desert Shulkers
Tweaks.description:
Changes the textures for Shulkers when placed in Desert or Mesa biomes. The texture is a palette swap of the __Fixed Shulkers Addon__, that uses the color palette of Red Sandstone.

requiresefr

inspiration{[Whimzee](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8qKTXf_-obk)}

Tweaks.name: Faded Classic Command Block
Tweaks.description: Changes the texture of the old Command Block to be faded with lowly blinking lights. It is recommended to only use this Addon in conjunction with [Future Commands](https://www.minecraftforum.net/forums/mapping-and-modding-java-edition/minecraft-mods/2888753-moved-to-a-new-website-future-commands-v1-3). Also renames the Command Block to 'Classic Command Block'.

Tweaks.name: Shifting Prismarine Bricks
Tweaks.description:
Changes the texture of the Prismarine Bricks to slowly shift color to match Prismarine.

requiresefr

Tweaks.name: Written Note
Tweaks.description: Changes Written Books whose titles include 'Note' in any way to appear as a Paper with scribbles on it. Additionally, when titled 'Crumpled Note', it'll appear as crumpled and when titled 'Ripped Note' appears as a ripped piece of paper.

Tweaks.name: Stacking Arrows
Tweaks.description:
Changes Arrows so that they display different textures when they are stacked.

#78B159{Attached is an additional file that makes the Quiver textures consistent with __Consistent Leather__.}

Tweaks.name: Blank Name Tag
Tweaks.description: Changes Name Tags so that they appear blank until they're named. Then they appear written. When the Name Tag is named 'Dinnerbone' or 'Grumm', it will look like it's upside-down, when it's named 'jeb_', it will cycle through the wool colors, when it's named 'Toast', it will display the Toast rabbit coloring and when it's named 'Johnny', it will look like it's been slashed and battered.

Tweaks.name: Desaturated Purpur
Tweaks.description:
Changes all Purpur Block textures to be slightly desaturated. Also applies to the pink part of the End Rod.

requiresefr

inspirationvt

Tweaks.name: Darker Dark Oak Leaves
Tweaks.description:
Changes the texture of Dark Oak Leaves to be slightly darker than the normal Oak Leaves counterpart.

inspirationvt

Tweaks.name: Magical Mushrooms
Tweaks.description:
Changes the textures of the Mushrooms blocks, to take on a purple (in case of Brown Mushroom) and pink (in case of Red Mushroom) shade, when placed in Roofed Forests. or Thaumcraft's Magical Forest. Also includes the rotational properties of the Rotated Mushrooms Addon.

inspiration{[Os' Mystical Mushrooms](https://modrinth.com/resourcepack/os-mystical-mushrooms)}

overridemaster{Rotated Mushrooms}

Tweaks.name: Clean Redstone
Tweaks.description:
Changes the textures of placed-down Redstone Dust to be cleaner and less frizzy.

inspirationvt

Tweaks.name: Full-colored Leather Armor
Tweaks.description:
Changes the texture of all Leather armor pieces so that they lose the brown overlay and instead get colored all the way.

inspirationvt

incompat{Comprehensive Armor Upgrade}

Tweaks.name: Stacking Paper
Tweaks.description: Changes Paper, Maps and Filled Maps so that they display different textures when they are stacked.

Tweaks.name: Splash Bottle o'Enchanting
Tweaks.description: Changes the Bottle o'Enchanting's texture to be more fitting to its purpose and the __Unique Potions Addon__.

Tweaks.name: Pooling Dusts
Tweaks.description: Changes Gunpowder, Redstone Dust, Glowstone Dust and Sugar so that they display different textures when they are stacked.

Tweaks.name: Spinning Jukebox
Tweaks.description: Changes the Jukebox's western side texture to show a record, that starts spinning when a disc is placed into it.

Tweaks.name: Suspicious Silverfish Stones
Tweaks.description:
Gives Silverfish Stones an overlay that looks like Suspicious Gravel in relation to normal Gravel.

incompat{Utility Silverfish Stones}

Tweaks.name: Bottled Ghast Tear
Tweaks.description:
Changes the Ghast Tear texture to make it appear bottled rather than just on its own.

inspiration{[Sukuro](https://www.planetminecraft.com/texture-pack/mob-drop-tweaks/)}

Tweaks.name: Ball o'Yarn
Tweaks.description: Changes Strings so that they display different textures when they are stacked.

Tweaks.name: Opaque Slime Blocks
Tweaks.description:
Changes the Slime Block texture to be completely opaque.

requiresefr

inspirationvt

⚠️ Careful: This does not change the properties of the block. It will still be transparent and will not block light.
